abstract: Two products are formed in the process of carburization of iron with hydrocarbons: iron carbide (Fe3C, cementite) and in the next stage - carbon deposit. This paper deals with the formation of carbon deposit on nanocrystalline iron from ethylene decomposition and the reduction of its product with hydrogen.
title: Synthesis of Nanocarbon Materials by Carburization of Nanocrystalline Iron
